Improvements.Improvement: Refactor the method into smaller methods
Improvements.Description: The method is too long and does multiple things. It is recommended to refactor it into smaller methods, each doing one specific thing. This would improve readability and maintainability of the code.
There is deep nesting in the current code, which makes it hard to read and understand. Consider refactoring the code to avoid deep nesting.
There are magic numbers (305, 308) in the current code. Consider defining these as constants with meaningful names.

Improvements.Change_Diff:
- LOG.debug('Load response for ' + method + ' '+ url.toExternalForm());
+ LOG.debug(String.format('Load response for %s %s', method, url.toExternalForm()));
Improvements.Description: The current code uses string concatenation with '+'. Consider using String.format to improve readability and performance.
